long_description:
Drum roll, please! Theater lovers, take heed. We’re about to hit the best time of the year: NYC Broadway Week. If you know what this means, go immediately to the official website to hunt for tickets. If you’ve no idea what we’re talking about, read on.

 

The Theater District will be offering 2-for-1 tickets on approximately 20 musicals, drama and comedy shows on Broadway running from January 16 to February 4, 2018. Tickets go on sale on January 5 and the list of selected shows will be published on the NYCgo website. Keep in mind that this deal is too good to miss - tickets sell out like hot bread! We recommend subscribing to the newsletter to be on top of the latest updates.

 

If this seems too good to be true, wait until you hear the rest. Given our strategic location and highly-rated services, the Royalton Hotel has been chosen as a partner to the event as part of the NYC Broadway Week Winter Stay deal. If you book to stay with us between January 15 and February 5, you’ll get significant discounts on our exclusive rooms and a daily $25 food and beverage on-property credit! This translates to the perfect opportunity to indulge in the specialty dishes the Forty Four Restaurant has to offer. And why not try out a nightcap after your show at  Bar 44?

 

Although some may be dissuaded from braving the cold winter months in NYC, our guests need not worry about it. Roaring fires await in every room - and we take pride on being the only hotel in the five boroughs that can say this!

 

So, let’s recap: 2-for-1 Broadway tickets, discount rates during NYC Broadway Week, a daily $25 food and beverage credit, warm and comfortable rooms at the Royalton and being within walking distance of the Theater District. Christmas has come all over again!
